WEATHER FORECAST FOR 17 August 2025
Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 16 August 2025
Several spells of showers will occur in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces
and in Kandy, Nuwara-Eliya, Galle and Matara districts.
Mainly fair weather will prevail over the other areas of the island.
